_description: Randomly shift values for each channel of the input RGB image.
name: RGBShift

r_shift_limit._description: Range for changing values for the red channel. If r_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-r_shift_limit, r_shift_limit).

g_shift_limit._description: Range for changing values for the green channel. If g_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-g_shift_limit, g_shift_limit).

b_shift_limit._description: Range for changing values for the blue channel. If b_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-b_shift_limit, b_shift_limit).

always_apply._description: If true, the augmentation is always applied.
